current_evidence.name: Marcus's Coffee Receipt
current_evidence.description: Time-stamped receipt showing Marcus purchased coffee at 11:12 AM with $20 cash, proving he was at Café Mocha during crucial time window

current_evidence.name: Tom's Testimony
current_evidence.description: Witness saw Marcus at coffee shop 11:05-11:15 AM, appearing distressed and muttering about regretting something he said
current_evidence.relevance: Corroborates alibi but shows emotional state

current_evidence.name: Jenny's Testimony
current_evidence.description: Barista confirms Marcus was at shop 11:05-11:15 AM, seemed agitated, left large tip due to distraction

key_timeline.10:30 AM: Marcus argues with Dr. Volkov at Thornfield Pharmaceuticals
key_timeline.11:05-11:15 AM: Marcus at Café Mocha (confirmed by witnesses and receipt)
key_timeline.11:30 AM: Dr. Volkov found dead in his office

questions_remaining: How did Dr. Volkov die exactly?
What happened between 11:15 AM (Marcus leaves café) and 11:30 AM (body discovered)?
Who else had access to Volkov's office?
What was the actual cause of death?
